meanings.definition: A person who makes something real or brings something into existence.
meanings.sent1: The realizer of the plan turned it into reality.
meanings.sent2: She is the realizer of all our dreams.
meanings.sent3: The realizer of the magic trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: As a realizer of ideas, he turned imagination into tangible results.
meanings.sent5: The realizer's touch transformed the ordinary into extraordinary.

meanings.definition: A person who recognizes or understands the true nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The realizer of the problem quickly found a solution.
meanings.sent2: She is a realizer of hidden talents in others.
meanings.sent3: The realizer of the mystery novel guessed the ending early on.
meanings.sent4: As a realizer of emotions, she could sense the truth behind the smile.
meanings.sent5: The realizer's insight revealed the beauty in simplicity.
